name: Discovering magnificent Hamburg
description: This 2 - hours trip will show you the highlights of The-Gate -To-The-World-City, which is Hamburg. No boring lectures and bunches of dates! Only funny, interesting and catchy peculiarities. During  my triip you can make a wish in a Hamburg way, find out about Hamburg's most famous pirate - Klaus Störtebeker and see Hamburg as it has looked like 300 years ago.
